scripts.check:records: rg -n "\bRecord\b(?!<)" src && (echo '❌ bare Record found' && exit 1) || echo '✅ Records ok'
scripts.check:catch: rg -n "catch\s*\((error|e)\)" src | rg -v "parseError|: unknown" && (echo '❌ unsafe catch found' && exit 1) || echo '✅ catches ok'
scripts.check:icons: rg -n "from 'lucide-react'" src | rg -v 'src/ui/icons.ts' && (echo '❌ direct lucide imports' && exit 1) || echo '✅ icons centralized'
scripts.check:errors-compat: rg -n "from '@/utils/errorHandler'" src && (echo '❌ legacy errorHandler import found' && exit 1) || echo '✅ no legacy imports'
